answers.answer: 33 is very low. We strive to have our blood sugar between 80-120 and sometimes at 80 I feel as if I need to take some glucose.  I think you should visit www.jdrf.org it is the Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation website.  It has some very useful information and if you visit the website look for the tab with ODST and click on it and you will be put in touch with someone in your area dealing with diabetes and will be able to help you and answer your questions.

question: What is the range that glucose should be for a 9 month old. My grandsons is 33 and that seems really low to me.  Is there a sight i can print out this info for mom and dad?
title: normal glucose range for infant
